column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Very excellent. Checked this place out while vacationing in Houston. The service was good and very prompt. I liked the communal tables in the center of the room. Best part are the noodle refills
column2: I live noodles so this was a plus! Definitely worth a try
column3: plus the atmosphere is really fun
column4: when new guests come in everyone yells. In short
